titleStmt.title: A full relation of the Scots besiedging [sic] Newcastle, and their taking the glasse houses, and other forts. With a list of the chief malignants in the town. Also, the victorious Lord Fairfax his taking of Whitby, where he surprized; 500. officers and soldiers. 1000. sailers and inhabitants. 40. ships in the Channell. Good store of powder. 500. armes. 20. commissioners of array. All their traine of artillery. 100 peece of ordnance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop, according to order,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in the imprint date is crossed out;Feb. 20th 1643.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
